statements: SELECT * FROM tv_show_episodes;
SELECT title, air_date FROM tv_show_episodes;
SELECT episode_number, title, runtime FROM tv_show_episodes ORDER BY episode_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, runtime FROM tv_show_episodes ORDER BY runtime ASC, title DESC;
SELECT title, air_date, runtime FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE episode_number = 1;
SELECT * FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE runtime > 30 ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_episodes FROM tv_show_episodes;
SELECT episode_number, title, runtime FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE air_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(runtime) AS avg_runtime FROM tv_show_episodes GROUP BY runtime HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT episode_number, title FROM episodes WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, runtime FROM episodes WHERE runtime < 30 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM episodes WHERE episode_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT show_title FROM tv_shows ORDER BY show_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM episodes WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT episode_number, title FROM episodes WHERE runtime > 30 ORDER BY episode_number DESC;
SELECT title, runtime FROM episodes WHERE air_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY air_date ASC;
SELECT show_id, show_title FROM tv_shows ORDER BY show_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM episodes INNER JOIN tv_shows ON episodes.show_id = tv_shows.show_id WHERE episodes.runtime > 40 ORDER BY episodes.air_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, network FROM tv_shows WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT season_number, episodes_count FROM seasons WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT title, air_date, runtime FROM episodes ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasons WHERE episodes_count > 10 AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM episodes WHERE runtime > 30 ORDER BY air_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, air_date FROM episodes WHERE episode_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY air_date ASC;
SELECT title, season_number FROM episodes JOIN seasons ON episodes.episode_number = seasons.episodes_count WHERE episodes.runtime >= 40;
SELECT title, network FROM tv_shows WHERE country = 'USA' AND start_year > 2010 ORDER BY start_year DESC, title ASC;
SELECT show_id, title, episodes_count FROM tv_shows JOIN seasons ON tv_shows.show_id = seasons.season_number WHERE seasons.start_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM episodes WHERE episode_number = 1;
SELECT title, air_date FROM episodes WHERE runtime > 30;
SELECT episode_number, title, runtime FROM episodes WHERE air_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT season_number, start_date, end_date FROM seasons ORDER BY season_number DESC;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_name = 'Action' ORDER BY genre_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM episodes WHERE episode_number > 10 ORDER BY air_date DESC
SELECT title, air_date FROM episodes WHERE runtime > 40
SELECT season_number, start_date, end_date FROM seasons ORDER BY season_number
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT episode_number, AVG(rating) as average_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY episode_number HAVING AVG(rating) > 8.0
SELECT * FROM tv_show_episodes
SELECT title, air_date, runtime FROM tv_show_episodes ORDER BY air_date DESC
SELECT title, runtime, air_date FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE runtime > 30
SELECT director_name, episode_number FROM directors INNER JOIN tv_show_episodes ON directors.director_id = tv_show_episodes.episode_number
SELECT actor_name FROM actors INNER JOIN episodes_cast ON actors.actor_id = episodes_cast.actor_id WHERE episodes_cast.episode_number = 5
SELECT episode_number, title, air_date, runtime FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE runtime > 30;
SELECT title, air_date FROM tv_show_episodes WHERE air_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT title, genre_name FROM tv_show_episodes JOIN genres ON tv_show_episodes.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT actor_name FROM actors WHERE actor_id IN (SELECT actor_id FROM episodes_cast WHERE episode_number = 1);

SELECT director_name, COUNT(episode_number) AS total_episodes FROM directors JOIN tv_show_episodes ON directors.director_id = tv_show_episodes.director_id GROUP BY director_name ORDER BY total_episodes DESC;
